page.title: 04BROWNIE PACK & GUIDE COMPANY
page.content:
The 1st Castle Carrock & Talkin Brownie Pack and Guide Company are two small units: Brownies 7-10 year olds, Guides 10-15 year olds. They meet once a week - Brownies in the Watson Institute, Guides in the school and the Girl Guides Association's programme is followed.
The old village school at Talkin, now Fircones, is used for holidays for Brownies and Guide from all over the County.
1985 marks 75 years of guiding in this country and both units have taken a full part in the celebrations - the Brownies winning the County Competition for the best birthday cake. Also in October both Brownies and Guides will join in planting bulbs in the village to mark the 75 years.
